data.title: Legislative Research: HI SB1478
data.meta_description: 2024 HI SB1478 (Research) Relating To Offensive Cybersecurity.
data.text:
2023

Regular Session

(Engrossed - Dead)Establishes an offensive cybersecurity program within the office of enterprise technology services to analyze and evaluate cybersecurity threats and increase cybersecurity awareness and education. Establishes a goal for all state and county agencies ...

[SB1478 2023 Detail][SB1478 2023 Text][SB1478 2023 Comments]

Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on FIN with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Kitagawa excused (1).

2012

Regular Session

(Introduced - Dead)Prohibits partial-birth abortions, with exceptions. Provides for penalties.

[SB1478 2012 Detail][SB1478 2012 Text][SB1478 2012 Comments]

Carried over to 2012 Regular Session.
